title: News Feed / Timeline Front-End System Design
description:
Design a social news feed (Facebook/Instagram style) from the front-end perspective. Cover initial load, pagination/infinite scroll, virtualization, media lazy-loading, real-time updates, and smooth interactions (likes/comments) with optimistic UI.

Key considerations:
- Fetch strategy: initial load vs incremental pages and refresh.
- Virtualized rendering to keep DOM size bounded.
- Media handling (images/video), placeholders, and caching.
- Real-time updates (polling/stream) and how you merge new items.
- State and interaction design (like/comment) without jank.

Be prepared to discuss: dedupe, ordering, cache invalidation, scroll anchoring, and how to keep performance stable at scale.
